resources.string: SecuredCameraShots
Check Network
Grant Permission
Google\nDrive
Free\nSpace
Choose\nAccount
Capture\n Media
File \nProtection
View \nFiles
Ensure the device has good internet connection and adequate network data bundle for uploads.
Scroll to SecuredCameraShots on the permission screen and allow \' Appear On Top \' permission for the app to function properly.
It is recommended to install Google Drive app for easier file management.
Ensure there is adequate free space in your Google Drive storage to avoid failure while uploading file.
Choose Google account whose Google Drive will be used to store uploaded media files. Captured files will be automatically upload to the account\'s Google drive.
Choose Google account to be used for uploading media files. Captured files will be automatically upload to the account\'s storage.
Create a long video or shorts and upload on youtube. Interact with your subscribers on youtube live.
Choose desired option for uploading media file.
Choose desired option for uploading media file to Google Drive.
The folder access is PIN-Protected with a maximum of 3 failed attempts per 10 minutes.\n Only file access is affected by PIN lock.
Choose same email address as logged in user to view the captured files stored in Google Drive.\n Incase of issue accessing the files,logout and login again.".

High Quality: This setting produces videos with higher resolution and better quality. It results in larger file sizes.\n\nLow Quality: This setting produces videos with lower resolution and reduced quality. It results in smaller file sizes(faster to upload).
Email: megacoreapps@gmail.com \n\nPhone Number: +2347049374664.
